trans-unit.resname: PDP12·1 | Frost Titan | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}.

trans-unit.resname: PDP12·1 | Frost Titan | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

trans-unit.resname: PDP12·2 | Grave Titan | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PDP12·2 | Grave Titan | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

trans-unit.resname: PDP12·3 | Inferno Titan | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: PDP12·3 | Inferno Titan | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
